original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 302.80/303.10 to dollar at open, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee pegged at 302.80/303.10 against the US dollar in the spot market on Thursday, while bond yields were steady, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 26.80/90 percent steady from Wednesday’s close at 26.85/27.00 percent .
The Sri Lanka rupee is at 302.80/303.10 against the US dollar in the spot market on Thursday from 303.50/304.20 rupees a day earlier. (Colombo/May24/2023)
